fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NOS. 9A & 9B, 2/F, WAI WAH CENTRE, NOS. 11-17 SHA TIN CENTRE STREET, SHA TIN, NEW TERRITORIES
fehd.ADR_TC: 新界沙田   沙田正街11-17號偉華中心2樓9A&9B號鋪

geocode_en.formatted_address: 9A-9B, Wai Wah Centre Block 2, 11-17 Sha Tin Centre St, Sha Tin, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 9A-9B, Wai Wah Centre Block 2, 11-17 Sha Tin Centre St, Sha Tin, 香港

result.adr_address: 9A-9B, Wai Wah Centre Block 2, 11-17 Sha Tin Centre St, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 9A-9B, Wai Wah Centre Block 2, 11-17 Sha Tin Centre St, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.name: FL Fusion

reviews.text:
Place is mediocre at best. Some of the soup dumplings no longer had soup because the skin was already broken when the dish was brought to our table. The pan fried bao (生煎饅頭) was delicious and slightly oily. 

My dad found the rice dish had a little bit too much MSG in the meat which threw him off. Overall it was a nice place for lunch but nothing super extraordinary. The pigeon was delicious but a little small, but this isn't a fine dining restaurant so we didn't expect too much

I came during afternoon tea time for lunch with a friend of mine. Decoration was pretty stylish and the price for afternoon tea is good.  The problem with a lot of dim sum places is that a lot of dim sum are frozen and reheated before serving.  However, with this place you could taste that it is made from the kitchen itself. We ordered the truffle on 燒賣, 乳鴿, 小籠包 and some noodles.  I really enjoyed the truffle on 燒賣 and 乳鴿. Both were juicy and tasty. 小籠包 was good too just the meat inside wasn’t marinated as great as what I’ve had before.  The seafood noodles was nothing special.  Would come back for afternoon tea for sure

The chefs are most creative in their attempt to modernise the traditional dim sum pleasing to the eyes as well as retaining the original taste. The 炸糧looks like 炸大脹、but tasted excellent.

The tiled floor has a 60’s feel and the chairs and tables matched well. The only drawback is tables are square rather than round. This makes sharing of foods rather awkward.

Overall, the value for foods are good; especially the 滷水乳鴿。
Very pretty designs. Particularly liked the hedgehog bun and durian swan

Restaurant that serves modern Cantonese Dim Sum. The dishes are creative in cute animal shapes. The quality is OK, the fried pigeon is exceptionally good. The place may be a bit noisy like other restaurants in HK, and crowded so don't expect top notch service. But overall you get a great value out of the very reasonable price.

result.vicinity: 9A-9B, Wai Wah Centre Block 2, 11-17 Sha Tin Centre Street, Sha Tin

result.formatted_address: 9A-9B, Wai Wah Centre Block 2, 11-17 Sha Tin Centre St, Sha Tin, 香港
result.name: 富臨薈

reviews.text: 食物質素可以，中午時段客人不算多，有不少空枱，穿白恤衫應是經理的男職員取走茶壺，加完水後周圍望亦不知交回我枱，最後放在快子碗枱面便離開，我再等一回仍未交回茶壺，便行出去問另一侍應自己取回，問其中一女待應，竟说經理很忙作藉口，令客人對你店服務態度大打折扣。另外，你店屬中式食店，連普利壽眉也沒有，只有玄米茶，没有選擇似乎不合理吧。

這間新派Fusion的中菜食店已幫襯了很多次，食店室內裝修優雅有格調，節日的時候有很多期間限定自創菜式及賣相精美的點心，但只提供玄米蕎麥茶。早上不是太多人排隊，來吃一個brunch，點了食店推介招牌菜—炸乳鴿，乳鴿皮脆肉嫰，很juicy，廿幾蚊一隻好抵食，但每人只限一隻，基本上來光顧的人都會點這道菜。黃金奶皇包熱騰騰，撕開餡料流沙奶黃流出，好好味，另一款也很有特色的點心——洛神紅米金沙腸，用洛神花造成的腸粉皮包着脆皮鮮蝦配上甜甜的醬汁，口感非常好，值得推介。
位於沙田難得易揾位，環境舒服，乳鴿平宜好食，其他食品也可，日後可以繼續幫襯
